name: Gala
description:
Version: 1.0 from 03 February 2020

Description:
Videogame is a simple arcade videogame. Videogame is a clone of Galaga, Space Invaders. But, it I not 100 percent clone, it is authors vision of such kind of games, creative vision. Game theme - exploration of space, retro computers in 80s.

You control a spaceship. Move using LEFT and RIGHT and fire with rockets by SPACE.

So, let`s return in 80s. Space invasion of aliens is begin. In space there is a war. You are a pilot of spaceship. And you fight in space to destroy the aliens.

Control:

Gameplay:
Key SPACE – fire
Arrows LEFT and RIGHT – move
ESCAPE – pause

In menu:
Key SPACE,ENTER – select
Arrows LEFT and RIGHT – move

Program runs in window with 640 x 480 resolution. It is possible to run game in fullscreen. Fullscreen or windowed mode can be set in menu OPTIONS->SCREEN.
This is 64 bit application for Windows OS.

Important point

So, videogame is written in C++, that’s why you need Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Package for Visual Studio 2015, 2017 and 2019, that can be downloaded from Microsoft website: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/2977003/the-latest-supported-visual-c-downloads

One more

There is authors website with videogames and some more. Site is on russian and english languages. Mainly on russian.  So there is some art as imaginative box art and imaginative cartridge art  on authors page for this videogame. Check it for yourself.

Also, there is a webpage on authors website (English Version) : http://www.dimalink.tv-games.ru/galaeng

А также есть веб-страница игры на сайте автора (Русская Версия): http://www.dimalink.tv-games.ru/gala
